alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 5:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jefferson, southeastern Thomas and Brooks Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 549 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Monticello, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quitman, Boston, Morven, Alma, Fincher, Dixie, Dills, Grooverville, Festus, Everett, Oaklawn, Pidcock, Empress, Jarrott, Brooks Co A/p, Blue Springs, Metcalf and Lake Miccosukee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
